items.name: Lane Brightness
items.description: The brightness of the background behind falling notes.

items.name: Vertical Gauge
items.description: Whether the life gauge is vertical (fills downwards).

items.name: Scratch on right side
items.description: Move the scratch to the right side of the play area (player 2 layout)

name: Textures
description: The textures used in the game.

items.name: Note
items.description: The texture used for notes.

items.name: Landmine
items.description: The texture used for landmines.

items.name: bomb
items.description: The texture used for the animated explosion triggered when a note is hit.

items.name: Gauge
items.description: The texture used for the life gauge.

items.name: Glow
items.description: The texture used for the glow at the bottom of the play area.

items.name: 5 Keys Cover
items.description: The texture used for the cover of redundant lanes for the 5 keys mode.

items.name: Judgement
items.description: The texture used for the judgement text and combo number.

items.name: Key Beam
items.description: The texture used for the judgement text and combo number.

name: Positioning
description: The positions of elements on the screen.

items.name: Play Area
items.description: The area where notes are played. Its width is the sum of column widths and spacings.

items.name: X
items.description: The X position of the left side of the play area rectangle.

items.name: Y
items.description: The Y position of the top side of the play area rectangle.

items.name: Height
items.description: The height of the play area rectangle. This can be covered by lane cover or lift.

items.name: Note Columns
items.description: The sizes of notes.

items.name: White Width
items.description: The width of white (even) notes.

items.name: Black Width
items.description: The width of black (odd) notes.

items.name: Scratch Width
items.description: The width of scratch notes.

items.name: Spacing
items.description: The number of pixels between columns.

items.name: Bga
items.description: The position of the background video/image.

items.name: X
items.description: The X position of the left side of the BGA rectangle.

items.name: Y
items.description: The Y position of the top side of the BGA rectangle.

items.name: Scale
items.description: The size of the BGA square.

items.name: LifeBar
items.description: The position of the life bar.

items.name: X
items.description: The X position of the left side of the life bar rectangle.

items.name: Y
items.description: The Y position of the top side of the life bar rectangle.

items.name: Width
items.description: The width of the life bar rectangle.

items.name: Height
items.description: The height of the life bar rectangle.

items.name: Judgement Counts
items.description: The position of judgement counts.

items.name: X
items.description: The X position of the left side of the judgement counts rectangle.

items.name: Y
items.description: The Y position of the top side of the judgement counts rectangle.

items.name: Width
items.description: The width of the judgement counts rectangle.

items.name: Height
items.description: The height of the judgement counts rectangle.

name: Z-order
description: The z-index of elements on the screen.

items.name: Play Area Z
items.description: The z-index of the play area.

items.name: BGA Z
items.description: The z-index of the BGA.

items.name: Life Bar Z
items.description: The z-index of the life bar.

items.name: Judgement Counts Z
items.description: The z-index of the judgement counts.
